sources.title: Into Schrodinger's Box | Full Drama Movie | Covid -19 Lockdown | 2021
sources.description:
Into Schrodinger's Box - In this daring psychological thriller, musician Sofia must cope with the stress and isolation of quarantine after her husband is infected with COVID-19. Sofia's loneliness leads to confusion, fear, and paranoia as her grip on reality falters.
2021.  Stars: Ada Shkalla, Lee Lawson, Geoff Mays
